name: lovdata-assistent
description: Lovdata Assistant - Fullstack application for legal search and answers

scripts.build: cd backend && env NODE_ENV=development npm install && npm run build && cd ../frontend && env NODE_ENV=development npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p public && cp -r frontend/dist/* public/ && (test -f frontend/dist/vite.svg && cp frontend/dist/vite.svg public/vite.svg || cp frontend/public/vite.svg public/vite.svg 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.install:all: cd backend && NODE_ENV=development npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
